title: Memory Game
description: Find all matching pairs of cards!

instructions.desktop: Click cards to flip them. Find all matching pairs.
instructions.mobile: Tap cards to flip them. Find all matching pairs.

how_to_play.title: How to Play
items: Click or tap a card to flip it
Click or tap another card to find a match

tips.title: Pro Tips
items: Remember where you've seen each card
Focus on the cards that don't match

celebration.title: Congratulations!
celebration.subtitle: You found all pairs in {{moves}} moves!
